headline: Senior Software Engineer | Full-Stack (React & Node.js) | Testing & Quality Infrastructure
summary: Seasoned Software Engineer with a decade of experience specializing in building robust, scalable infrastructures for complex web applications. My recent work in the Web3/Fintech space involved architecting critical systems from the ground up, providing me with a unique end-to-end perspective—from database schemas and API contracts to the intricacies of the client-side experience. I thrive on solving complex engineering problems and leveraging modern tools to deliver high-quality results with exceptional velocity.

roles.title: Software Engineer, Automation & Infrastructure
responsibilities: Architected and built a complete E2E and API testing framework from the ground up, using Playwright, Prisma, and GraphQL to validate a complex Nest.js + React web application.
Engineered a custom Node.js CLI tool to automate integration with TestRail, dramatically improving the efficiency of managing and executing test suites.
Acted as a key engineering partner within the R&D Agile scrum team, providing critical feedback on new features to ensure system testability, performance, and reliability.

roles.title: Frontend Developer
responsibilities: Drove the development and refactoring of critical features for the company's core CRM application within a large-scale Angular/React monorepo.
Owned the frontend quality domain by writing and maintaining a comprehensive suite of E2E, integration, and unit tests (Jest, Playwright).
Implemented complex UI components using TypeScript and advanced RxJS patterns.

roles.title: CMS Lead
responsibilities: Promoted to lead the CMS team, where I mentored two developers and defined the team's entire development workflow and coding standards.
Architected a modular, page-builder-like framework on a modern WordPress/Laravel stack.
Established a Docker-based local development environment and wrote supporting deployment scripts to streamline the team's specific CMS development lifecycle.

roles.title: CSS Developer
responsibilities: Built the company's foundational, reusable UI component library and CSS architecture.
